title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, December 23, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Robert Bly (Madison, MN, 1926), who for decades exchanged letters twice a week with his friend, fellow poet Donald Hall.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Robert Bly (Madison, MN, 1926), who for decades exchanged letters twice a week with his friend, fellow poet Donald Hall.
